channel.title: Need help with this its hard to explain and easy to solve but i dont no how to
channel.description: you know when you click on the little running guy next to the toolbar? And at the bottom they have like emote i want one to say pkbox and make it tele you to some coords i got. Someone help me please?

item.title: Need help with this its hard to explain and easy to solve but i dont no how to
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

open client find case 185 and find the case number of the emote you want to edit i’ll just give the first emote it would be

case 168:

then under it you would put

case 168: teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; break;

then to make it say pk box or whatever you would find

update();

and right under it add

sendFrame126("pk box", 180);//frist emote slot

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with this its hard to explain and easy to solve but i dont no how to
